relation.text: now more generally distinguished -- Though to this Appelation they have no exclusive Claim , yet it is somewhat more correctly descriptive of their Religious Tenets than that of Socinians -- since they renounce
Monday 6 Sepr . as soon as my letter was dispatched
rode 30 miles after it & in consequence has been ill ever since -- he is now
gave credit to her aſsertions & many relieved her Neceſsities -- That her Children , except the oldest were totally uneducated & She herself had been many Years
most of time to reading -- One day
throw her aside at the end of the Year
